text: George Miller (born 3 March 1945) or Dr. George Miller is an Australian movie director, screenwriter, producer, and a former doctor. Miller is mostly known for the Mad Max franchise and Babe movie series. He also wrote and directed the Academy and BAFTA Award winning movie Happy Feet. Miller was born in Brisbane, Australia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Australian movie directors Category:Australian screenwriters Category:Australian movie producers Category:People from Brisbane Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:BAFTA Award winners
title: George Miller (director)
